topics.body:
I am plotting a alternate history RP where the Arab kingdoms are on par with Europe, and by that effect the Moorish Caliphate of Cordoba replaces Spain as the primary colonizer of the Americas.

I have chased this concept to its inevitable conclusion with there being an inevitable Caliph of Mexico.

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b36538636872521f420000#post_53b36538636872521f420000
[bq="SeraphimDawn"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b3632f63687271ee090100#post_53b3632f63687271ee090100
That is one of the most stupid political maneuvers I've even seen. [/bq]
I've seen worse, but yeah it's pretty stupid because if Ginsberg retires then she'll just get replaced by another Scalia or such.

Let's do some basic math; chances are several of our supreme court justices will have to retire in the next decade due to old age, Hillary is going to be president and the republican platforms, such as their anti-glbt stance, are extremely unpopular with younger generations thus will fuck them over in future elections.

Wow they're dumb.
